article.text: Norwegian mass killer Anders Behring Breivik confers with Tord Jordet, a member of his defence team, in courtroom 250 during the second day of his terrorism and murder trial in Oslo today. Picture: REUTERS OSLO — The Norwegian far-right gunman who massacred 77 people last summer took to the stand for the first time on Tuesday at his trial, describing it as a sophisticated and spectacular attack.
